attributes.action: Cut number of MPs by one third
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need efficiency savings and need to cut the number of MPs. 1. Start with Scotland, N Ireland and Wales who have their own parliaments. 2. Make it a condition of employment that candidates have worked for at least 8 years in the real world OUTSIDE of Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
